page.title: 20Games Children Play
page.content:
We play various games in the playground including the more traditional to games we make up ourselves like Rebounds. In this game you take it in turns to kick a ball against a wall and the next person must kick it on the rebound. If you miss, you are out and the last person left in, is the winner. Other games we play include Chain-he and British Bulldog, both games of chase and capture. Some children play quieter games in the classroom, especially in the winter, like chess or they might use the computer. ---oOo---
{All the work for this Domesday Project {was undertaken by the pupils of the {Upper Junior Class, Hatfield Heath {County Primary School, aged 10 and 11 {years old. }
